attributes.action: stop referring to 'hard working families' when single people work hard too!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister and other members of the Government keep referring to 'hard working families'.  Whilst many families are feeling the strain due to high fuel and food prices this situation is not unique to them.

Please stop using this phrase as it seems to forget that other people in our society are also finding things tough at this time.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
